content:
I don't have personal views or beliefs, but i can comment on what experts are saying.

the trend suggests that traditional cable tv may eventually become obsolete as more people are turning away from traditional cable and satellite tv and towards streaming services. streaming services offer viewers more flexibility, lower costs, and the ability to watch content on a variety of devices.

moreover, traditional cable tv is associated with the concept of "appointment viewing" which means that you have to be available at a specific time to watch a particular show or broadcast event. however, streaming services offer viewers the freedom to watch the content they want, when they want, and how they want, which is more appealing to many people.

that being said, some people still prefer the familiarity and simplicity of traditional cable tv. however, as more people adopt streaming services, traditional cable tv providers will need to adapt to the changing consumer preferences or risk becoming obsolete.
